resource.name: Cities' Net Pension Asset and Liability for Fiscal Year 2020-21
resource.description: Net Pension Asset (NPA) is the amount in excess of the amount owed to a defined benefit pension plan based on the actuarial present value of projected benefit payments for plan members and their beneficiaries less the plan’s net position. Net Pension Liability (NPL) is the amount owed to a defined benefit pension plan based on the actuarial present value of projected benefit payments for plan members and their beneficiaries less the plan’s net position.
